name: Arc de Triomphe
description: The monument commemorates the victory of Austerlitz battle.

name: Colosseo di Roma
description: Monument dedicated to the Emperor Nero, it is an Amphitheater from the time of the Roman Empire.

name: Florence
description: It houses several masterpieces of Renaissance architecture and art.

name: Tour Eiffel
description: The monument commemorates the centenary of the French Revolution, intended to be the centre of attention of Paris.

name: Salar de Atacama
description: The Atacama Salt Flat is the largest salt deposit in Chile, located in the Antofagasta Region and situated exactly between two Chilean municipalities.

name: Torres del Paine
description: Torres del Paine is a commune in the southern region of Chile, located in the province of Última Esperanza, Magallanes and Chilean Antarctica Region, whose capital is Villa Cerro Castillo.

name: Torre di Pisa
description: The Tower of Pisa or Leaning Tower of Pisa is the bell tower of the Cathedral of Pisa, located in the Piazza del Duomo of Pisa, in the city of the same name, a municipality in the Italian region of Tuscany and capital of the homonymous province of Italy.

name: Valparaiso
description: Valparaíso is a port city on the coast of Chile. It is known for its steep funiculars and colorful houses on the hills.
